sense.def:
One's role
sta položaj in naloga posameznika v danih okoliščinah ali družbi.

seg.quote: What is the role of the University in modern society?
He had played a major role in the formation of the United Nations.

sense.def:
A role
je oseba, ki jo igralec ali pevec predstavlja v filmu, igri ali operi.

seg.quote: She played the leading role in The Winter's Tale.
